author: graymattr
title: Wither Skeleton!
review:
My youngest son started playing Minecraft since about 2014 and while I don't play, I think it's really valuable for young kids. I got this polybag set because of the minifigures -- I like the 8-bit printing and block shaped heads, and I love all Lego skeletons so this was an easy decision. Both minifigs also come with a Minecraft accessory, a sword and bow and arrow.

This is the same Steve minifig as many other Minecraft sets but the Wither Skeleton is unique to this set (at this time, anyway.)  I love that it's a black skeleton.

The rest of this set is basic bricks and just went straight into my sorting drawers.  There are some good colors here so it's not a waste.  The build (were you to build it) is very basic.

This polybag is a great deal at $5 for two minifigs and some extra Lego pieces thrown in. On that basis alone, I would recommend it.  I bought two for myself.
